lead_paragraph: A group of refugee athletes will march together in the opening ceremony of the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro in a symbol of hope for the world's migrants, IOC President Thomas Bach said Thursday.

headline.print_headline: IOC's Bach: Refugees Will Be Honored at Rio Olympics
headline.main: IOC's Bach: Refugees Will Be Honored at Rio Olympics
